NPC.name: drake
NPC.description: A four legged dog sized reptile covered in pale blue scales. It watches you with inquisitive and predatory eyes set in a slender long jawed lizardlike head, long tail flicking around as it adjusts its posture and flares its wings out in preparation to fly at you.

missText.text: a drake spits a bolt of fire at TARGET but misses
a drake fire blast narrowly misses TARGET

hitText.text: a drake scorches TARGET for VALUE points of thermal damage using a fire bolt
a drake singes TARGET with a firebolt for VALUE points of thermal damage
